mapper.insert: insert into product(product_id, product_name, product_img, product_price, product_size, product_color, product_inventory) values(#{productId},#{productName}, #{productImg},#{productPrice},#{productSize},#{productColor},#{productInventory})
insert into product_img(product_id, fileName, uploadPath, uuid) values (#{productId}, #{fileName}, #{uploadPath}, #{uuid})
